To correct this error, you should ensure that all the objects you manipulate belong to one XPObjectSpace.\r\nIn most cases, to avoid this error it's sufficient to call the XPObjectSpace.GetObject/GetObjectByKey methods to get a passed object in the target XPObjectSpace.\r\nIf this doesn't help, please contact our Support Team at http://www.devexpress.com/Support/Center/"/>
